# My Agent

My assistant use the AnimatedContent, AnimatedList, BlurText, Carousel, ScrollStack, SplitText, SpotlightCard, Stack and TextType components located at src/components folder
My assistant use the Accordion and button components located at src/components ui
My assistant use the InfoCard and SectionContainer components located at src/layouts
My assistant can Create customs components for using on each page
My assistan can use download and ShadCN Components

My assistant Create a consistence, beauty and animated page design for each page
